messages.title: It's time to fix Calderdale
messages.content: Cllr Ruth Goldthorpe is campaigning with Cllr ... to fix the mess the Conservatives have made on Calderdale.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Criticising Conservatives for axing all the unnecessary spending and cutting the council's debt.
Emphasizes the importance of consulting with local people before making decisions.
Concern over fallen police numbers in West Yorkshire. Would scrap the planned ID Card and use the money to recruit an extra 10,000 police officers.

issues.education: Concern about the order of school rebuilding priorities in Calderdale, believes Todmorden High is a priority.

housing.content: Despair over Calderdale Council's priorities in rebuilding schools.

politicalExperience.role: Founding Secretary of Community Transport Calderdale

images.caption: Cllr Ruth Goldthorpe with Cllr Olwen Jennings and Hilary Myers.
Cllr Ruth Goldthorpe outside Todmorden High School.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet mentions 'Four steps to a fairer Britain'. Policies include fairer taxes, fair chance for every child, creating jobs by making Britain greener, and fair deal from politics.
